Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util

Class FSUtils.UserTableDirFilter

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.AbstractFileStatusFilter
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.FSUtils.BlackListDirFilter
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.FSUtils.UserTableDirFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathFilter, FileStatusFilter
Enclosing class:
FSUtils
public static class FSUtils.UserTableDirFilter extends FSUtils.BlackListDirFilter
A PathFilter that returns usertable directories. To get all directories use the FSUtils.BlackListDirFilter with a null blacklist
